snippet: The plan for 2014 includes a troubling cut to Social Security and other better ideas that put Republicans on the spot.
abstract: Editorial argues that Republican rejection of Pres Obama's compromise-driven 2014 budget only reinforces their reputation for hypocrisy and hollow intransigence; holds that Americans will continue to suffer economic harm under arbitrary sequester cuts until budget is agreed upon.
lead_paragraph: The plan for 2014 includes a troubling cut to Social Security and other better ideas that put Republicans on the spot.
